# Katherine Singer Kov치cs Society for Cinema and Media Studies Book Award

Katherine Singer Kov치cs Society for Cinema and Media Studies Book Award is a prestigious book award that is given annually for outstanding scholarship in cinema and media studies. The award is made annually by the Society for Cinema and Media Studies  and includes a prize of 1500 dollars. The prize is named in honour of Katherine Singer Kov치cs.
